content: a nice pin cushion is a must have for every needle-yarns-fabric crafter i finally designed the first pin cushion in all my life its shape reminds me of famous french sweets and i called it macaron the pattern 6 pages is very easy to follow it offers detailed instructions and basics of this crochet technique as well as lots of progress pictures a few for each round all stitches are also explained in the pattern and i m sure that advanced beginners will easily handle it this pattern is written for one size the size of the finished pin cushion depends on the yarn and hook you use my cushion is approx 6 cm 2 ½ inches large across and 2 5 cm 1 inch high **materials ** leftovers of yarn in three colors the crochet hook 2 75 mm c or the size that will give an acceptable gauge you will need a very small amount of yarn you will also need scissors tapestry needle to weave the ends in and stuffing i wish you pleasant crocheting hours and hope that you will enjoy this pattern
